head.supplied: Kiel. 20 January 1892 ¶ Very esteemed Baron, ¶ ¶ I would certainly not like to fail to give you my best thanks for your kindly sending of algal material. The algae from Port Fairy were very interesti...

div.p: RB MSS M108b, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

MS is a postcard addressed: 'Herrn Baron Ferd. v. Mueller Dr. pp. Hochwohlg. Melbourne Victoria (Australia)'. It is stamped 'Kiel 21' [i.e. January 1892] and 'MELBOURNE 22 S FE 24 92'. Kiel. 20. Jan. 1892

p.seg: Ich möchte doch nicht verfehlen, Ihnen für Ihre freundlichen Sendungen von Algen material meinen besten Dank zu sagen. Die Algen von Port Fairy waren sehr interessant, und lieferten einige seltenere Arten, von denen ich natürlich dem Universitäts Herbar mitgetheilt habe. Die letzte Zusendung habe ich noch nicht präparirt — der Fundort erregt mir aber angenehme Erwartungen.

div.p: Mit bestem Grusse in vorzüglicher Hochschätzung

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
I would certainly not like to fail to give you my best thanks for your kindly sending of algal material. The algae from Port Fairy were very interesting
No record of transmission of a collection from Port Fairy, Vic, has been found. and provided some rare species, which of course I have given to the University herbarium. I have not yet prepared the last consignment - but the locality produces pleasant expectations in me.
With best greetings in special esteem
